page.title: 02FOOD
page.content: Most parents,when they cook a meal at home,make sure that there is a mixture of vegetables,meat and fruit.Now we seem to be eating not so much meat.In Falmer School Canteen,there is a large selection,from salads to cakes,and snacks to hot dinners.Most people nowadays choose their own balanced diet from shops and cafes without even realising it,like eating a grapefruit for breakfast,like quite a few people do now,will give you vitamin C for the whole day.Chips and hamburgers are very popular in quite a few countries,but in Brighton,so many people visit here,so thousands of chips and fatty foods will get eaten in one year.All of my family like to have some cakes,biscuits,chocolates or sweets once in a while,but too many could damage your health. By D.Torch
